com.lightbend.akka.diagnostics

Class DiagnosticsRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lightbend.akka.diagnostics.DiagnosticsRecorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Extension

    public class DiagnosticsRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
implements akka.actor.Extension
    INTERNAL API: Akka Diagnostics Recorder writes configuration and system information to a file that customers can attach to Lightbend support cases. The information will help us at Lightbend to give you the best possible support.

    It will register a MBean in the "akka" name space, which can be accessed from a JMX console such as JConsole. From JMX you can trigger thread dumps that will also be appended to the file.

      • runCollectThreadDumps

        public void runCollectThreadDumps(int count)
        Collect a number of thread dumps with configured interval. The thread dumps and some basic metrics such as heap usage are appended to diagnostics report file.
        Parameters:
        count - (undocumented)
